Header: Kanduboda Meditation Practitioners Hold One More Bavana Session
Content: A meditation programme organized by the Directorate of Psychological Operations to raise spiritual standards and mental peace among Officers and Other Ranks of the Armed Forces, had one more session at Kanduboda, ‘Bavunseth Manasika Sevana Vipassana Bhavana’ Centre on Thursday (5). 1 Officer and 59 Other Ranks including 3 Officers and 15 Sailors serving in the Sri Lanka Navy participated in the sessions. Ven Diyasenpura Wimala Thero conducted these meditation sessions.
